ingredients.ingredient: 1 (20 ounce) package Green Giant® Garlic & Herb Mashed Cauliflower

cookingTips: Use chicken or vegetable broth instead of milk for a lighter soup with more savory flavor
Heat soup gently to avoid scorching and maintain smooth texture
Top with additional Parmesan and fresh herbs for added depth
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This convenience recipe is a great base—what fresh ingredients could you add to elevate it?
